participant_1.background:
I have never been arrested, but I have had my fair share of close calls.
I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix.
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples.
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.

we have a dog.

content.text: I just got home from the bookstore! I love reading and my mom used to take me to the bookstore all the time when I was a kid.
Aww that's so nice! I love to read too, but I don't get as much time to do it as I'd like.
Yeah, me too. I usually only get to read on the weekends.
Do you have a favorite book?
I have a few! But my favorite one is probably "To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee.
That's a great book! I read it in high school and really enjoyed it.
I know, right? It's so well-written.
What are you reading right now?
I'm actually reading "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. I'm really enjoying it so far!
That's another good one! I read that one in college and it was really interesting.
Yeah, I'm really liking it. I'm not sure what I'm going to read next, but I'm excited to find out!
I'm sure you'll find something great!
